summary: Bizarre tale of sex, betrayal, and perversion at a military post.
cast: Elizabeth Taylor|Marlon Brando|Brian Keith|Julie Harris|Zorro David|Gordon Mitchell|Irvin Dugan|Fay Sparks|Robert Forster|Ed Metzger|Ted Beniades|John Callaghan|Jed Curtis|Frank Flanagan|Trent Gough|Harvey Keitel|Al Mulock|Robert Rietty|Douglas Stark|Friedrich von Ledebur
title: Reflejos en un ojo dorado
